Source code for comet.cli.data

import click
import os
from comet.lib import print_title, logger
from comet.cli import *

_logger = logger.get_logger(__name__)

DOMAIN = env('DOMAIN', "")
DATASET_ID = env("DATASET_ID", "")
DATASET_VERSION = env("DATASET_VERSION", "v0.2.0")
DATASET_DIR = env("DATASET_DIR", "./assets")



[docs]def execute_cmd(cmd):
    os.system(cmd)



@click.group()
def data():
    pass


@data.command()
@click.option("--name", "-n", "name",
              type=str,
              show_default=True,
              default=f"comet_{DOMAIN}".lower(),
              help="The data id")
@click.option("--description", '-d', "description",
              type=str,
              show_default=True,
              default="where to save model for comet",
              help="The description for model")
@click.option("--status", "status",
              type=str,
              show_default=True,
              default="public",
              help="The description for model")
def create(name, description, status):
    if not name:
        _logger.error(f"Create a new model container, need NAME DOMAIN "
                      f"provided> You can configure in environment file")
        exit()
    print_title("Creating a dataset container")
    create_resources(name, description, status, "dataset")


@data.command()
@click.option("--id", "id",
              type=str,
              show_default=True,
              default=DATASET_ID,
              help="The data id")
@click.option("--version", '-v', "version",
              type=str,
              show_default=True,
              default=DATASET_VERSION,
              help="The data version")
def ls(id, version):
    print_title("DATASET INFORMATION")
    list_items_cli(id, version, 'dataset')

    links = get_all_item_data_url(id, version)
    print_title("All data links")
    for link in links:
        print(link)


@data.command()
@click.option("--out_dir", '-o', "out_dir",
              type=str,
              show_default=True,
              default=DATASET_DIR,
              help="Folder to get data")
@click.option("--id", "id",
              type=str,
              show_default=True,
              default=DATASET_ID,
              help="The data id")
@click.option("--version", '-v', "version",
              type=str,
              show_default=True,
              default=DATASET_VERSION,
              help="The data version")
def download(out_dir, id, version):
    download_cli(id, version, out_dir, True, False, type='dataset')


@data.command()
@click.option("--out_dir", '-o', "out_dir",
              type=str,
              show_default=True,
              default=DATASET_DIR,
              help="Folder to get data to upload to")
@click.option("--status", '-s', "status",
              type=click.Choice(['private', 'public']),
              show_default=True,
              default='public',
              help="policy of data")
@click.option("--id", "id",
              type=str,
              show_default=True,
              default=DATASET_ID,
              help="The data id")
@click.option("--version", '-v', "version",
              type=str,
              show_default=True,
              default=DATASET_VERSION,
              help="Tag version to upload")
@click.option("--clear", '-c', "clear",
              is_flag=True,
              show_default=True,
              help="Clear all data then upload")
def upload(out_dir, status, id, version, clear):
    if not os.path.isdir(out_dir):
        _logger.error(f"Folder: {out_dir} not exist!!")
        exit()
    if clear:
        delete_cli(id, version, 'dataset')
        # tag_cli(id, version)
    _logger.info(f"Upload dataset from folder: {out_dir}\n"
                 f"\tID: {id}\n"
                 f"\tVersion: {version}\n"
                 f"\tStatus: {status}")
    upload_cli(id, version, out_dir, "", True, 'dataset')
    set_policy_cli(id, version, status)



[docs]def get_url_item(item_id):
    get_item_url_cli(item_id, 'dataset')
